name: The Kuki Boy III: Keo's Adventure (Golfinho)
name_original: The Kuki Boy III: Keo's Adventure (Golfinho)
description:
A little boy named Keo has had his cookie stolen by the villain Caishot, so now his goal is to face the villain and get his cookie back. 

Controls:
WASD - (Move)
Left mouse button - (shoot)

(You can enable/disable mobile controls)

Game by: @golfinho080
